basics.name: Alejandro Alonso Lopez
basics.label: Computer Science Student specializing in Software Design and Web Development
basics.summary: Second-year Computer Science BSc (Hons) student at Robert Gordon University, passionate about Software and Web Development. Strong interest in creating innovative solutions, with a solid foundation in programming, problem solving, and collaborative projects.

work.name: Bakio Surf Cleaner
work.summary: Developed a desktop application for a surf school to automatically filter and remove short video clips from surf session recordings, improving training efficiency.Designed and implemented a user-friendly tool tailored for surf coaches, automated repetitive video management tasks using Python and enhanced workflow efficiency and saved significant time in training analysis.
highlights: Designed and implemented a user-friendly tool tailored for surf coaches,
automated repetitive video management tasks using Python and
enhanced workflow efficiency and saved significant time in training analysis.

volunteer.summary: Participated in the 2024 RGU Hackathon, collaborating with peers to design and develop innovative solutions under time constraints.

awards.title: 2nd Place - FLL Robotics Competition
awards.summary: Achieved 2nd place in robotics competition at age 12, demonstrating early interest and talent in technology and innovation.

awards.title: 4th Place - FLL Scientific Project
awards.summary: Awarded 4th place in scientific project category, highlighting creativity and applied problem solving.

awards.title: 1st Place - FLL Team Values
awards.summary: Recognized for teamwork and collaboration in the values category.

awards.title: Cambridge English Advanced (C1)
awards.summary: Certified C1 level in English, proving advanced proficiency in communication, writing, and comprehension.

awards.title: Participant - RGU Hackathon
awards.summary: Took part in RGU Hackathon 2024, collaborating with a team to design and prototype an innovative app in a short timeframe.

awards.title: High School Diploma in Science and Technology

projects.name: Wild Buddy
projects.description: Hackathon project app that analyzes, tracks and identifies animals, helping scientists, students and zookeepers.
highlights: Developed computer vision and data analysis features
Built under tight deadlines during RGU Hackathon
Worked with data analysis libraries and machine learning models in Python

projects.name: Bakio Surf Cleaner
projects.description: Desktop app for surf school coaches to automatically remove short video clips from surf session recordings.
highlights: Improved training efficiency by automating repetitive tasks

projects.name: UFC Matchup Predictor
projects.description: Machine learning project to predict future fights.

projects.description: Responsive personal portfolio built with Astro, HTML and CSS to showcase projects and skills.

Implemented responsive design for desktop and mobile

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website (React)
